name: autonomous-agent-template
description: Minimal harness for long-running autonomous coding with Claude Agent SDK

scripts.reset:temp: rm -rf temp/index.html temp/package.json temp/.autonomous && cp -r temp-skeleton/. temp/ && sqlite3 temp/.autonomous/db.sqlite < temp/.autonomous/features.sql && echo 'Reset complete. Features:' && sqlite3 temp/.autonomous/db.sqlite 'SELECT id, name, status FROM features'
